original_title: UFC Fight Night 94: Poirier vs. Johnson
overview: UFC Fight Night 94: Poirier vs. Johnson was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship held on September 17, 2016, at State Farm Arena in Hidalgo, Texas. A lightweight bout between Dustin Poirier and Michael Johnson served as the event headliner.
title: UFC Fight Night 94: Poirier vs. Johnson
